price: Na wakisema: Hata ukituletea Ishara yoyote kutuzuga hatuto kuamini.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَهۡمَا تَأۡتِنَا بِهِۦ مِنۡ ءَايَةٖ لِّتَسۡحَرَنَا بِهَا فَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Na kwa hii fikra mbovu waliyo nayo wakaendelea na upinzani. Walisema walipo ona miujiza ya Musa: Wewe hata ukituletea kila namna ya Ishara zinazo onyesha ukweli wa wito wako, ili kutuachisha dini yetu, na tusiwafanye watumwa watu wako, sisi hatukusadiki wala hatukufuati.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū mahmā tatinā bihi min āyatin litasḥaranā bihā famā naḥnu laka bimu'minīna
